title: Scribble Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This

package contains 14 Scribble sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.


Features:


● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/jdKVds0Stgc


Technical details:


● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Painting 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Painting 02 _#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Painting 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Painting 04_#[512,288].png 2048x1257

● Painting 05_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Painting 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Painting 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Painting 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1257

● Painting 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Painting 10_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Painting 11_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Painting 12_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Painting 13_#[512,288].png 2048x1257

● Painting 14_#[512,288].png 2048x1382


Number of Textures: 14

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
